lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The leftist-led FUT said it was also backing a call by the Maoist Popular Movement for Democracy (MPD) party, to have Congress impeach and oust Febres Cordero, a conservative, for having adopted the austerity measures.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The 500,000-strong Unitary Workers' Front (FUT) and the 100,000-member General Union of Workers (UGT) called the strike to cancel the measures, which include a rise in petrol prices of up to 80 per cent and budget cuts of as much as 10 per cent.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The Ecuadorean central bank, which is the institution remitting debt payments abroad, uses the official rate of 95 sucres to the dollar for its accounting purposes.
